Articles.Content:
My surface and orbital surveyor scanner says it scans for

-water

-minerals

-exotic minerals

nitrogen

-karbonite

-ect.

 

But how do I get these resources? AFAIK the parts in game do not harvest those, only ore. Are these fake resources?

Your game is modded since these resources are showing up. The Community Resource Pack (just a library for resources) adds these. Beyond that, there is no purpose and other mods are required in order to make use of them. You have to know (or ask around) what mod you want in order to use them.
